title: Rwenzori National Park
description: This park is a protected reserve with great biodiversity, ideal for hiking and bird watching. It is home to majestic mountains, glaciers, lakes, and exceptional flora and fauna.

title: National Museum of the Democratic Republic of Congo
description: An intriguing museum showcasing the history and culture of Congo, with a rich collection of ancient artifacts, sculptures, and traditional art objects spanning centuries.

title: Inga Falls
address: Kongo-Central Province, Democratic Republic of Congo
description: These impressive waterfalls, located in the west of the DRC, are a must-see for nature and adventure lovers, offering a spectacular view and a peaceful environment amidst the tropical rainforest.

title: United Nations Square
description: The United Nations Square is an iconic site in the heart of the city, used for political gatherings, national events, and celebrations. It is surrounded by important government buildings.

title: Boboto Cultural Center
description: A space dedicated to art and culture, where exhibitions, workshops, and performances are held. This center showcases local talent and promotes cultural exchange with the rest of the world.

title: Liberty Market
description: An energetic market where you can purchase local products, souvenirs, and unique handcrafted items. It's the perfect place to discover traditional products, from crafts to local spices.

title: La√Økoro Park
address: Mongala Province, Democratic Republic of Congo
description: A natural park offering relaxation areas, picnic spots, and hiking trails to explore the local wildlife and flora. This park is a perfect place to enjoy a moment of peace and connect with nature.

title: Notre-Dame Cathedral of Congo
description: A magnificent cathedral, a symbol of Christianity in the region, with its imposing architecture and peaceful atmosphere. A must-visit site for spiritual and cultural visitors.
